=== Current Issues ===
 - The touchpad does not scroll (FIX: https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/320632 )
 - The sound volume is mute at 50%
 - The front mic does not work
 - The bluetooth adapter is not recognized after disabling it using the hardware wireless switch (FIX: sudo /etc/init.d/bluetooth restart )
 - There is a latency when disabling wifi and the touchpad is lost for 5 seconds. It might come up without scrolling (FIX: sudo modprobe -r psmouse; sudo modprobe psmouse )
